item.title: Post: [2022-05-14 Sat 18:06]
item.description: Sneakers is one of my favorite movies, so of course I enjoyed Cracking the Code: Sneakers at 30. It’s arguably the best film about the internet ever made, and it came out before the internet as we know it was even really a thing. The word ‘internet’ isn’t even uttered.
item.content:encoded:
Sneakers is one of my favorite movies, so of course I enjoyed Cracking the Code: Sneakers at 30.

It’s arguably the best film about the internet ever made, and it came out before the internet as we know it was even really a thing. The word ‘internet’ isn’t even uttered.
